Lebedenko||0||0||0||0||1||0||0||0||1||0 |- |26||||FW||Aleksei Medvedev||0||0||0||0||0||0||1||0||1||0 |- |colspan="3"| |TOTALS |102 |4 |11 |2 |26 |1 |6 |0 |145 |7 |} ==Notes== ;Notes *Note 1: Played in Moscow at Luzhniki Stadium as there was severe cold in Kazan and Rubin Kazan's Central Stadium had a probable frozen pitch. Kickoff also moved to 13:00 CET (15:00 local time) due to cold weather.Severe cold forces early kickoff for Rubin v Twente tie *Note 2: Played at the Luzhniki Stadium in Moscow due to the severe cold weather in Kazan, which meant the pitch at Rubin Kazan's Central Stadium would be frozen. Kickoff also moved to 12:00 CET (15:00 local time) due to cold weather.http://uk.eurosport.yahoo.com/24012012/2/rubin-kazan-face-olympiakos- moscow.html ==References== Category:FC Rubin Kazan seasons Rubin Kazan Rubin Kazan
